channel.title: CNN on Devashree Madhugiri
channel.description: Recent content in CNN on Devashree Madhugiri

item.title: Using CNN for Image Classification on CIFAR-10 Dataset
item.description: Image classification has a wide range of applications in different industries. Neural Networks are a better choice for image based problems. In this blog article, I explore the CIFAR-10 dataset using CNN with a step-by-step tutorial. This dataset contains 6000 images and 10 labeled categories and is good starter dataset for Deep Learning. This article has been published on Medium. Read the full blog article here.
